data.text: @_ALibertyWizard @clbergpowers @selise Protect my healthy habits, unlearned miscreants! https://t.co/mR3afsDXlg
@clbergpowers @selise So you're no longer following the science.

@selise :( I just wrote the Board of Health health@worcesterma.gov and asked them to please consider setting a 60% threshold for 5-18 vaccinations before removing the mandate. 70% of kids have a first shot, we can finish this job!

@clbergpowers Thank you. I had not seen that.

Just checked MWRA data which looks like it has stopped decreasing and is still 5-10 times higher than last June lows.
